mapper.sql: id, name, lecturer, category, cover_url, price, orig_price, subject, created_time, startTime, terminal_time, course_text
mapper.select: select id , name , category , cover_url as coverUrl , course_text as courseText, created_time as createdTime from sys_course

select id , name , category , cover_url as coverUrl , course_text as courseText from sys_course where concat( name, category, course_text, subject, lecturer )
like concat('%',#{params},'%')
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_course
id,
name,
lecturer,
category,
cover_url,
price,
orig_price,
subject,
created_time,
startTime,
terminal_time,
course_text,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lecturer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{origPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{subject,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createdTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{starttime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{terminalTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{courseText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sys_course
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lecturer = #{lecturer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cover_url = #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
orig_price = #{origPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
subject = #{subject,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=DATE},
startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE},
terminal_time = #{terminalTime,jdbcType=DATE},
course_text = #{courseText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_course set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lecturer = #{lecturer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover_url = #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, orig_price = #{origPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, subject = #{subject,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=DATE}, startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, terminal_time = #{terminalTime,jdbcType=DATE}, course_text = #{courseText,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
